def describe_cluster(cluster_id, emr_client): """ Gets detailed information about a cluster.
:param cluster_id: The ID of the cluster to describe. :param emr_client: The Boto3 EMR client object. :return: The retrieved cluster information. """ try: response = emr_client.describe_cluster(ClusterId=cluster_id) cluster = response['Cluster'] logger.info("Got data for cluster %s.", cluster['Name']) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get data for cluster %s.", cluster_id) raise else: return cluster
